                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
                                w[l] = w[l] || [];
                                w[l].push({
                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });
                                var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

</div>

                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {

                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });

                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

</div>

                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                        })
                }

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))

                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                    <script>
                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
                                w[l] = w[l] || [];
                                w[l].push({
                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });
                                var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();
            </script>

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
                                w[l] = w[l] || [];
                                w[l].push({
                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });
                                var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();
            </script>

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
                                w[l] = w[l] || [];

                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });
                                var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();
            </script>

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                        })
                }

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

        <!-- new GA4 -->
                    <script>
                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
                                w[l] = w[l] || [];
                                w[l].push({
                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });
                                var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();
            </script>
        
                    <script type="text/javascript" aysnc="true" src="//cdn.fuseplatform.net/publift/tags/2/3871/fuse.js">
</script>

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
                                w[l] = w[l] || [];
                                w[l].push({
                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });
                                var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();
            </script>

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                        })
                }

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

</div>

        <header>
    <div class="poster mobileOnly">

                 class="gallery-launch"
                 alt="A Minecraft Movie" style="aspect-ratio: 0.66666666666667">
            </div>
    <hgroup class="movie-info">
        <h2 class="movie-title">
            A Minecraft Movie <span class="release-year">(2025)</span>        </h2>
                    <h3 class="movie-director" id="movie-director-link">
                Directed by <span>
                    <a href="https://www.allmovie.com/artist/jared-hess-an24324">Jared Hess</a>                </span>

                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {

                                j.async = true;

                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {

                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'

                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {

                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });

                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
                                w[l] = w[l] || [];

                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });

                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();
            </script>

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
                                w[l] = w[l] || [];

                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });

                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();
            </script>

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
                                w[l] = w[l] || [];
                                w[l].push({
                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });
                                var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();
            </script>

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {

                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

        <!-- new GA4 -->
                    <script>
                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';
                                    }

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
                                w[l] = w[l] || [];
                                w[l].push({
                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });
                                var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();
            </script>
        
                    <script type="text/javascript" aysnc="true" src="//cdn.fuseplatform.net/publift/tags/2/3871/fuse.js">
</script>        
                                <meta name="google-adsense-account" content="ca-pub-7469247490545938">
            <script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js?client=ca-pub-7469247490545938" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);

                        })
                }

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // set default values for data layer variables
                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- Google Tag Manager -->
                            (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
                                w[l] = w[l] || [];

                                    'gtm.start':
                                        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
                                });

                                    j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

</div>

                async function setGA4() {

                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {

                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';

                                    adunit_id: 100000942,
                                    div_id: "cf_async_" + Math.floor((Math.random() * 999999999))
                                };
                                document.write('<div id="' + opts.div_id + '"></div>');
                                var c = function () {
                                    cf.showAsyncAd(opts)
                                };
                                if (typeof window.cf !== 'undefined') c(); else {
                                    cf_async = !0;
                                    var r = document.createElement("script"),
                                        s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
                                    r.async = !0;
                                    r.src = "//srv.tunefindforfans.com/fruits/apricots.js";
                                    r.readyState ? r.onreadystatechange = function () {
                                        if ("loaded" == r.readyState || "complete" == r.readyState) r.onreadystatechange = null, c()
                                    } : r.onload = c;
                                    s.parentNode.insertBefore(r, s)
                                }
                                ;
                            })();
                        </script>

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                        })
                }

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {

                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {

                        })
                }

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>

                var loggedInUser = 'notLoggedIn';
                var subscribedUser = 'notSubscribed';
                var adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';

                // override login and subscribed if logged in and/or subscribed
                if(User.loggedIn) {
                    loggedInUser = 'isLoggedIn';

                // override adblocker state, then push
                async function setGA4() {
                    const googleAdUrl = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
                    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                    var promise = await fetch(new Request(googleAdUrl))
                        .then(function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'notAdblocking';
                        }, function() {
                            adblockStatus = 'isAdblocking';
                        })
                        .finally(function() {
                            dataLayer = [{'event': 'userData','loggedInUser': loggedInUser,'subscribedUser': subscribedUser,'adblockStatus': adblockStatus}];

                                j.async = true;
                                j.src =
                                    'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
                                f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
                            })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-TBK7BSX');
                            <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
                        })
                }
                setGA4();

                    <div class="trivia">

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
            function getParentTitle() {
                return encodeURIComponent(document.title);
            }

            function getParentDomain() {
                return window.location.hostname;
            }

            function getMainDomain(host) {
                const parts = host.split(".");
                const count = parts.length;
                return count > 2 ? parts[count - 2] + "." + parts[count - 1] : host;
            }

            let title = getParentTitle();
            let domain = getMainDomain(getParentDomain());

            let iframes = document.getElementsByClassName("iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag");
            Array.from(iframes).forEach(iframe => {
                null
                iframe.src = "https://triviatrap.net/" + "store-mcqs-bottom-250" + "?content=" + title + "&domain=" + domain;
            });
        });
    </script>

    <iframe class="iframe-class-bottom-250-contextual-tag" allowTransparency="true" style="width: 300px; height:500px; background: transparent; border: none;"></iframe>
